job.title: Website Data Analyst - Consumer Based Website Analysis
job.description: If you are a Website Data Analyst with 3+ years of experience, please read on! Job Title: Website Data Analyst Location: Boston MA Salary: $100-120K Based on experience Requirements: Bachelor's Degree in Data/Applied Statistics/Math or Computer Science field preferred This would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking to join a growing team in a dynamic industry! Take your career to the next level! Additional ways in which a candidate may stand out would be: Alteryx, Snowflake Predictive modelling using Python, R or other tool Working with big data What's In It for You Vacation/PTO Medical Dental Vision 401k What You Will Be Doing Identify the Top 3 customer behaviors on web that lead to conversion Analyze customer behavior to understand most compelling content by product Analyze any spikes & dips in KPIs vs plan/ historical/ trend Perform ad-hoc analysis and drive insights and recommendations to support channel growth Analyze Web statistics & Content performance Identify & raise gaps in tagging/tracking of website behavior Work with data teams to create projects to bring in new data points for analysis and reporting Implementation requirements of Adobe Analytics and Website Tagging Produce ad-hoc queries and develop reports to understand website behavior Create & maintain reporting dashboards for web and email KPIs What You Need for this Position Bachelor Degree in Data, Applied Statistics, Math or Computer Science field 5+ years of experience in Data Analysis 3+ years of Oracle, SQL 3+ years of working in Database/Data warehouse environments 3+ years of Tableau 2+ years experience on Adobe website tools Experience analyzing video performance on websites Strong data storytelling, quantitative & analytical skills Proven ability to work in fast paced, multi task environments Ability to communicate data trends in a business language with recommended actions to improve key KPIs based on customer behavior So, if you are a Website Data Analyst with 3+ years of experience, please apply today! Email Your Resume In Word To Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also: Jenn.Parrella@CyberCoders.com Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : JP10-1641985 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.*** Jenn Parrella - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Your Right to Work - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
